items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations for each user session
Recommendations update dynamically based on user interactions within the session
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
dependencies: User data collection and storage module
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users
Ensure GDPR compliance for user data

notes: Assumed that the platform already has user accounts, browsing history tracking, and a product catalog in place. No details provided on specific AI algorithms or personalization strategies.
